description: landscape scene with peaked mountains on L, sloping mountains on R with a visible treeline, and a small area of forest in the center; forest of individual evergreen-like trees in LL foreground; curved path running to the R with two distinct trees alongside in front

signed: LL in blue ink: Wrangell Mtn Alaska
title: Wrangell Mountain, Alaska
